Enchantment 6

Rigor Mortis
Combat
D4
spell id [id]: 939
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 4
spec [spec]: 8388608
casting time [casttime]: 250%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 300-
gems required [gemcost]: 3D
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Rigor Mortis
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The necromancer causes the joints of both friends and enemies to stiffen as their bodies suffer the fate of the newly dead. There is no immediate cure for the spell, but it ends after the battle.
All units on the battlefield occasionally take 10 AN fatigue dmg. Undead and inanimates are immune to the effect.
